title: DIY energy: UK solar inventions could reduce bills
description: Two companies hope a solar "sculpture" and solar blinds will attract buyers who cannot have roof panels.

title: Lapsus$: Two UK teenagers charged with hacking for gang
description: The actions of the relatively new group have led to an international police hunt.

title: Facebook users angry after accounts locked for no reason
description: Meta said it was investigating the issue but didn't say what caused it.

title: China's WeChat suspends some accounts linked to NFTs
description: The popular messaging app said the move was in line with "relevant national regulations".
